Articles.Content: I have an RSS/RO/RP installation with Scatterer, and recently I decided to build a flying boat. However, the way it bounces on waves, taking off is nearly impossible. Has anyone ever succeeded in building a viable flying boat or plane on floats  with this mod setup? Is it possible to tweak Scatterer somehow (besides simply turning off wave collisions)?

So I was able to make it work by changing Scatterer config in RSSVE, windspeed and mysterious m_omega,     m_windSpeed = 4 and   m_omega = 0.6 gave me smaller and slower waves and now I can take off and land
